QuestData.Title: Glittering Shell
QuestData.Description:
Hi, friend. I just wanted you to know that traveling with you has been the best ever!
I never thought I could learn so much about fighting, but now I feel like I can actually hold my own.
I will protect all of the wee ones that can't protect themselves!
<Poen produces a crab from somewhere, it has a bright shell.>
Like this little one. I found him a while back, while we were out. He looked so scared.
Hey, why don't you take him?
QuestData.LogDescription: Accept a gift from your companion.
